snippet: Thai Beverage has increased its stake in Fraser & Neave, the Singapore conglomerate that has agreed to sell its rights in Asia Pacific Breweries to Heineken for around $4.1 billion.
abstract: Thai Beverage has increased its stake in Fraser & Neave, the Singapore conglomerate that has agreed to sell its rights in Asia Pacific Breweries to Heineken for around $4.1 billion.

headline.main: Heineken Faces Challenge Over Asian Brewer
headline.print_headline: Heineken Faces Challenge for Asian Brewer
